register.subtitle: Join our political network for left-wing parties and activists.
register.name: Full Name
register.policy_note:
On Linx, reading content and even posting comments does not require an account.
Everyone is free to read posts and share thoughts — anonymously or under their name — without registration.

However, if you want to publish your own content, access to the dashboard is required. Dashboard users can:

• Create a political or personal public profile
• Publish articles, statements, announcements, reports, or opinion pieces
• Archive, edit, and organize their writings
• Use advanced tools such as drafts, categories, feedback, and moderation
• Maintain a private, secure space for long-form work and analysis

Registration on Linx is only necessary for this kind of active contribution.
We do not collect hidden or security-related data.
No IP address, location, or other data is stored without your awareness.

Only the information you voluntarily provide is saved — and solely to protect your content and access.
